member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS
member.summary: Contains information about a glyph cluster.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.width
member.summary: The total advance width of all glyphs in the cluster.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.length
member.summary: The number of text positions in the cluster.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.canWrapLineAfter
member.summary: Indicates whether a line can be broken right after the cluster.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.isWhitespace
member.summary: Indicates whether the cluster corresponds to a whitespace character.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.isNewline
member.summary: Indicates whether the cluster corresponds to a newline character.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.isSoftHyphen
member.summary: Indicates whether the cluster corresponds to a soft hyphen character.

member.name: DWRITE_CLUSTER_METRICS.isRightToLeft
member.summary: Indicates whether the cluster is read from right to left.
